author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Removing a ball
question: I'm stuck on problem set 5 where they require us to remove a ball when it hits the paddle. Could I get some help?
student_answer:
Recall: the starter file includes the handy helper function touch-paddle? and stipulates that "on-tick function MUST be designed as a composition of two other
functions called game-with-next-balls and game-with-caught-balls"

Think about where you'd want to place touch-paddle? And what you'd want to do with any given element of ListOfBall when it produces false and when it produces true (when a ball isn't touching the paddle and when it does touch the paddle, respectively). Drawing an example of a list where some balls touch the paddle and some don't might help, thinking about it in terms of (first lob) and (rest lob).
